definition: to help/to assist/mutual assistance/to rush into or up/to raise or hold up/high/tall/old variant of 欀/chariot horse (old)/change (old)
to inlay/to embed/to set (e.g. a jewel in a ring)/tiling/tesselation
to have a false tooth set in/denture

sentences.english: He sports an ivory-handled cane these days.
sentences.chinese: 这些天，他夸耀着他的镶有象牙的手杖。

sentences.english: The heart-shaped studs in clear crystal pavé will make your heart melt.
sentences.chinese: 心形透明密镶水晶耳钉足以让你心动。

sentences.english: Any mobile phone can be Swiss Diamond, these are just sample.
sentences.chinese: 什么手机都能镶钻的，这些只是示范图。

sentences.english: She did, indeed, have gold teeth.
Set an emerald in a pendant .
At the bottom there is a drain hole edged with a brass eyelet.
sentences.chinese: 在底部有一个镶了黄铜小孔的排水孔。

sentences.english: It's a blue sapphire surrounded by diamonds set in white gold.
sentences.chinese: 是一枚有钻石围绕，在白金底上镶有蓝宝石的戒指。

sentences.english: Ride who will, the mare are shoes .
sentences.chinese: 谁想把马骑，蹄铁镶马蹄。

sentences.english: The parquet floors shone like mirrors.
They are covered in clear crystal pavé and reflect the light in magical ways.
sentences.chinese: 密镶透明水晶，反射着另人惊艳的光芒。

sentences.english: Ten years' wine -Wuliangye, mixed with Worm grass, made up Dadaohexie Wuliangye.
sentences.chinese: 大道和谐五粮液，十年陈酒虫草镶。

sentences.english: Prominent mosaicism necessary was characteristic in PstI polymorphism.
sentences.chinese: 非常明显的片段镶崁现象也是多态性之特点。

sentences.english: The nickel-coating brass body & grinding stainless steel wafer.
sentences.chinese: 电镀铜制品并镶有平面不锈钢片。

sentences.english: Two exquisitely crafted Crystal Aurore Boreale and Violet crystal flowers hang gracefully from an intricate centrepiece embellished with clear crystal pavé.
sentences.chinese: 彩白色和紫罗兰色水晶花朵悬挂在透明密镶水晶花上。

sentences.english: A small beaded bag is wonderful for weddings elegant attire.
sentences.chinese: 精巧镶珠饰的包比较适合参加婚礼的优雅服饰。

sentences.english: Most of the rooms in this hotel are panelled .
sentences.chinese: 这家旅馆的房间大多镶了墙板。

definition: see 赤嵌樓|赤嵌楼[Chi4 kan3 lou2]
to inlay/to embed/to set (e.g. a jewel in a ring)/tiling/tesselation

small diamonds/melee (small diamonds used in embellishing mountings for larger gems)/splints (sharp-pointed diamond splinters)/clatersal (small diamond splints from which diamond powder is produced by crushing)
to gild/(old) wages paid to a performer or a troupe by a theater
to sew/to stitch together/to combine/to link/to connect/to put words together/to compose/to embellish
variant of 鎦金|镏金[liu2 jin1]
